Based on the user's preference cues and the provided list of movies, I would recommend the following two movies:

1. "MacGruber" (2010) - This action comedy film stars Will Forte as MacGruber, a washed-up celebrity who's been recruited by his arch-enemy, Dieter Von Cunth, to help him steal nuclear warheads from an alien spacecraft.

The film is known for its humor, action sequences and clever plot twists.

2. "You Again" (2010) - This family comedy film stars Jamie Lee Curtis as Ellen, a young woman who's been bullied by her high school classmate, Lisa, played by Christine Lakin.

Ellen has been bullied so badly that she has developed a phobia of people.

In an attempt to overcome her fear and get back into normal life, Ellen decides to confront her bully, Lisa, in order to make things right.

However, when Ellen confronts Lisa, Lisa is unable to control her anger and starts beating Ellen up.

While being beaten up by Lisa, Ellen manages to escape from Lisa and runs away from the scene of the crime.

Ellen then goes to see her father, Jack, who's been a retired detective with the Los Angeles Police Department.

Jack has been living in his house on the outskirts of the town of Los Angeles.

Jack is now in the process of preparing for retirement once again after having taken some time off from retirement due to some personal issues that he had been dealing with at the time.
